entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:51 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 11.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 11.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: 6.8°C
Wind: SW 30 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 early this afternoon. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
